description: Update an existing project revenue classification.
permissions: Allowed for admin users or users who are manager members of the broker.
side_effects: Updates fields on a project revenue classification record.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one of --name or --parent must be provided. Name is required if provided and must be unique within the same broker and parent; whitespace is stripped. If a parent is set, the classification must have a broker and the broker must match the parent classification's broker.
